title: Can't seem to extend client window.
body:
Yo. Back in the old client, I would have been able to stretch the client window to fit my 32". I can't seem to be able to do this in the new alpha client window. Means everything is suuuuper tiny and clustered. Just a heads up.

Anyone else having this problem? Or is it just me? {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Ctrl + makes it too big too fast ): like 1 click and it fill my whole screen maybe add a few smaller increments
I believe you have to use CTRL & '+' or '-' to resize the client right now.
